weka.classifiers.collective.trees.model

Class DecisionTreeNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode
      • weka.classifiers.collective.trees.model.DecisionTreeNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, javax.swing.tree.MutableTreeNode, javax.swing.tree.TreeNode
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CollectiveTreeNode

    public class DecisionTreeNode
extends javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode
implements java.io.Serializable
    A generic class for storing a node in a decision tree. It extends the default mutable tree node with some WEKA specific methods and fields.
    Version:
    $Revision: 2019 $
    Author:
    FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      DecisionTreeNode(DecisionTreeNode parent)
      initializes the node, adds itself to the parents children if parent is not null.
